title: Bubba's Back After Surgery, NASA Delays SLS Launch | Daily Best of August 29 | Rick & Bubba
description:
Bubba returns after gallbladder surgery and thanks the audience for the power of prayer. NASA delays the historic first launch of the new SLS rocket. Student loans being forgiven shines light on the real reason we are in this mess to begin with. In sports, Tom Brady tries to explain why he missed training camp and Aaron Rodgers explains how hard it was to avoid getting vaxxed. And lastly, Adler got a huge amount of wood delivered to his house and gets part of his body pinched in the process. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
